original_text: For he knew who was going to betray him, and that was why he said not every one was clean.
korean_text: 이는 자기를 팔 자가 누구인지 아심이라 그러므로 다는 깨끗하지 아니하다 하시니라

sentences.original_text: who was going to betray him
he said not every one was clean
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 사람이 깨끗하지 않다고 말한 것이다
